description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Expect spectacular battles in the most beautiful place in the entire universe! In a hitherto unprecedented monotonous scenery and the unique one-level system, you must shoot at everything that moves.
